author: Margaret Talev
title: Axios-Ipsos Coronavirus Week 6: Too soon for "normal" reopening
description: Data: Ipsos/Axios survey, margin of error of ±3.3 percentage points; Chart: Andrew Witherspoon/AxiosMost Americans feel it would be risky to return to "normal" life just yet, and would wait indefinitely or at least for a few more months for the threat of coro…
content:
Most Americans feel it would be risky to return to "normal" life just yet, and would wait indefinitely or at least for a few more months for the threat of coronavirus infection to subside, per the Axios-Ipsos Coronavirus Index.
Why it matters: President Trum… [+4447 chars]
